articles.content: Thanks to a perfect 16-for-16 performance from the field -- including banking in multiple jump shots -- Milwaukee Bucks star Giannis Antetokounmpo won his first NBA All-Star Game Most Valuable Player… [+8240 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Lopez
articles.title: Portland Trail Blazers' Anfernee Simons blows a kiss to rim in winning NBA dunk contest - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Although he failed to kiss the rim, as intended, Anfernee Simons still bested Knicks rookie Obi Toppin in the final round to become the first Trail Blazers player to win the NBA dunk contest.
articles.content:
Portland's Anfernee Simons was all smiles as he became the first Trail Blazers player to win the NBA dunk contest, which took place during halftime of Sunday night's All-Star Game in Atlanta.
Simons… [+2964 chars]

articles.author: Christian Nicolussi
articles.title: ‘Cam will be on top of our list’: First Cronk, now Storm eye Smith - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: On the same day the Storm defended Cooper Cronk’s cameo, they have made it known they want Cameron Smith for a similar mentoring role.
articles.content: Were good friends with Cameron and [his wife] Barb. I know hes going through a bit of a process at the moment. But if an opportunity presents itself, Ill try and do whats best for these leaders here.… [+1698 chars]

articles.author: Adrian Wojnarowski
articles.title: Former NBA All-Star forward Blake Griffin signs deal with Brooklyn Nets - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Blake Griffin is joining the Nets for the rest of the season. Brooklyn imagines him as a small-ball center option off the bench.
articles.content:
Six-time All-Star forward Blake Griffin has signed a deal with the Brooklyn Nets for the rest of the season, the team announced Monday.
The Nets are using one of their veteran-minimum-contract slots… [+1941 chars]
